name: todo-management-webapp
description: A webapp built on express.js and vue.js for managing to-dos
author: nickp10@hotmail.com

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run copy-vue
scripts.build-debug: npm run compile-debug && npm run copy-vue-debug
scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js src/assets && copyfiles -f node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js src/assets
scripts.copy-vue: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.vue build && copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/** build
scripts.copy-vue-debug: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.vue debug && copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/** debug
scripts.prepare: npm run copy-assets && npm run build
